question: 75 YRS OLD WITH HEART DESEASE HAVE INJECTION FRACTION OF 25%,  WHAT CAN I EXPECT? HAD MAJOR HEART ATTACK AT 50 YRS OF AGE. HAD ANURISIM ON LEFT SIDE OF HEART, HAVE HAD BAYPASS SURGERY, STINT AND BALLOON SURGERY, HAVE TYPE TWO DIABETES UNDER CONTROL, HAVE CHRONIC KIDNEY DESEASE UNDER CONTROL, HAVE HAD MULTI LEVEL BACK SURGERY IN LAST YEAR, HAVE HAD YEAR OF PT FOR BACK. STARTED HAVING MUCH FITIGUE  AT END OF PT.CAN NOW HARDLY STAY ON FEET MORE THAN 5 MIN. HAD NUCELAR  STRESS TEST WAS TOLD THAT INJECTION FRACTION WAS 25%, NOW WHAT DO I EXPECT?
title: APAMATICA
